front.title: •Aim High
front.gametext: Deploy on table. When you fire two weapons (except lightsabers) in a battle, your total power is +5. Also, whenever opponent retrieves X cards, opponent must first use X Force or that retrieval is canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The destruction of a command vehicle negatively impacts Imperial battle efficiency.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
Your Insight Serves You Well & Staging Areas
combo: Aim High + Leia With Blaster Rifle + Han With Heavy Blaster Pistol Power 12 if they both do fire their weapon and two battle destinies.
rulings: Dark has the option to decline and cancel the retrieval.
The amount of Force used ('X') equals the retrieval amount initiated, even if the Lost pile has fewer than X cards.
